settings.heading: About this Brand
settings.text: Warmtouch by Thermilate brings space-age technology to your fingertips. The Warmtouch coating creates a thermal barrier, which is made up of a unique combination and contains NanoCNB structures. Our latest combination Utilises patent-protected technology, used worldwide as an insulating solution, to combat the high & low temperatures encountered in various scenarios . This makes the surface feel warmer to the touch, and the texture non-slip with a high-quality semi-gloss finish.

settings.title: Quick Air-Drying Formula
settings.text: Experience the convenience of a quick air-drying formula with TRADE Insulating Handrail & Metal Paint, ensuring efficient application and fast results.

settings.title: Creates Warm-to-the-Touch Surfaces
settings.text: Create warm-to-the-touch surfaces with TRADE Insulating Handrail & Metal Paint, enhancing comfort and safety while reducing the risk of slipperiness from precipitation.

settings.title: Reduces Slipperiness from Precipitation
settings.text: Reduce slipperiness caused by precipitation and condensation with TRADE Insulating Handrail & Metal Paint, ensuring compliance with Health and Safety Building Regulations.

settings.heaing: Complies with Health and Safety Regulations
settings.title: Complies with Health and Safety Regulations
settings.text: Trust in TRADE Insulating Handrail & Metal Paint to comply with Health and Safety Building Regulations 2000 law, providing peace of mind for painters and decorators.

settings.title: Ideal for Various Metal Surfaces
settings.text: Benefit from the versatility of TRADE Insulating Handrail & Metal Paint, ideal for use on various metal surfaces such as handrails, gates, fences, railings, scaffolding tubes, benches, and stairways.

settings.text: Enjoy the flexibility of using TRADE Insulating Handrail & Metal Paint for both interior and exterior applications, providing thermal insulation and protection in any environment.

settings.text: Experience the thermal insulation properties of TRADE Insulating Handrail & Metal Paint, keeping surfaces warmer in winter for added comfort and energy efficiency.

settings.heaing: Helps Keep Surfaces Cooler in Summer
settings.title: Helps Keep Surfaces Cooler in Summer

settings.title: Thermal Insulation
settings.text: Enhances thermal insulation, making metal surfaces warm to the touch in winter and cooler in summer, providing comfort in all seasons.

settings.title: Extra Insulation Layer
settings.text: Adds an extra layer of insulation protection to metal surfaces, contributing to overall energy efficiency.

settings.title: Protective and Insulating Properties
settings.text: Dual functionality as it not only adds Colour but also provides protective and insulating properties, shielding surfaces from environmental factors.

settings.title: Versatile Application
settings.text: Suitable for both interior and exterior use, can be applied to handrails, gates, railings, and more, offering versatility in application.

settings.title: Strong Adhesion
settings.text: Ensures excellent adhesion to various surfaces including wood, metal, and dry plaster, facilitating easy application and durable results.

settings.title: Cost-Effective Coverage
settings.text: Offers wide coverage of up to 10 mÂ² per liter with the recommended one coat, making it a cost-effective painting solution.

settings.title: Convenience in Application
settings.text: Ideal for small-scale maintenance and spot-priming, easy to apply with a brush, roller, or spray, offering convenience for painters and decorators.

settings.title: Compatibility with Galvanized Metal
settings.text: Can be applied over suitably prepared galvanized metal, broadening its range of use and application.

settings.heading: HOW TRADE â€“ WARMTOUCH METAL PAINT WORKS
PREP
settings.text: Prep your area and walls by sanding, cleaning, and ensuring the surface is smooth & dry - use primer (or mist coat) on bare surfaces or fresh plaster board

settings.heading: PAINT
settings.text: Paint with either a roller, brush or spray

settings.heading: CLEAN
settings.text: Clean up any excess paint with cloths and any type you've used

settings.heading: ENJOY
settings.text: Enjoy your newly decorated spaces and decor
Breakthrough Metal Comfort

settings.heading: Touchable Technology
settings.text: Embrace the touchable transformation that Thermilate Warmtouch brings to metal surfaces, ensuring they remain comfortable to touch in all weather conditions.

settings.heading: Adaptive Temperature Control
settings.text: Metal surfaces no longer have to be a thermal liability; with Thermilate Warmtouch, they adapt to the climate, offering a warm touch in winter and a cool surface in the heat.

settings.heading: Energy Conservation
settings.text: Apply Thermilate Warmtouch to insulate critical equipment and spaces, like refrigerators and shipping containers, to enhance energy efficiency and performance.
Unmatched Versatility & Safety

settings.heading: All-Surface Application
settings.text: Whether it's handrails, benches, or industrial containers, Thermilate Warmtouch is versatile enough to be applied on a diverse array of metal surfaces, indoors and out.

settings.heading: Safety-First Formulation
settings.text: Safety is a paramount featureâ€”Thermilate Warmtouch reduces slipperiness on metal caused by moisture, ensuring a grip-friendly surface in all conditions.

settings.heading: Rapid Application and Durability
settings.text: With a rapid air-drying formula, Thermilate Warmtouch provides a quick return to service and long-lasting protection and insulation with minimal downtime.
Superior Aesthetics with Functional Excellence

settings.heading: Aesthetic Flexibility
settings.text: Thermilate Warmtouch is not just functional but also aesthetic, offering a finish that complements any design while providing the tactile benefits of warmth and coolness.

settings.heading: Season-Proof Insulation
settings.text: Reinforce metal surfaces against the seasonal temperature swings with Thermilate Warmtouch, ensuring they are insulated and energy-efficient throughout the year.

settings.heading: Cost-Effective Solution
settings.text: Investing in Thermilate Warmtouch is cost-effective, as it adds an insulating layer that protects and conserves energy, eliminating the need for additional insulating materials.

settings.heading: Thermilate Warmtouch The Ultimate Metal Surface Revolution
settings.text: Paint, Protect, Insulate! Discover the unparalleled innovation of Thermilate Warmtouch, the singular solution in the market for transforming metal surfaces. This exclusive technology equips metal with the ability to stay warm when it's cold out and cool under the summer sun, offering a year-round touchable experience. It's more than just paintâ€”it's an energy-saving ally for insulating a variety of equipment and structures, making Thermilate Warmtouch an indispensable addition to any project.
